name: unwaxed
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not covered with a thin layer of wax: I bought a couple of unwaxed oranges from the market. Line the tray with unwaxed baking paper.
If part of your body is unwaxed, it has not had the hair removed by being covered with a thin layer of wax that is then pulled off: unwaxed armpits Few celebrities would expose an unwaxed leg to the cameras. Opposite
waxed
More examplesFewer examplesUse the zest from unwaxed lemons in this recipe.I generally prefer to use unwaxed dental floss.Unwaxed lemons go rotten very quickly, so you will need to use them right away.
